languages.text: Тело еретика превращено в решето, в руке дымится однозарядный самопал.
The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.
languages.original_text: Тело еретика превращено в решето, в руке дымится однозарядный самопал.

traits.locale_text: The heretic's body is riddled with holes, a single-shot improvised gun smoking in his hand.
The heretic's body is riddled with holes, a single-shot improvised gun smoking in his hand.

The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.

languages.text: El cuerpo del hereje está hecho un colador. Una pistola improvisada de un solo disparo humea en su mano.
languages.original_text: The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.

traits.locale_text: El cuerpo del hereje está hecho un colador. Una pistola improvisada de un solo disparo humea en su mano.

languages.text: 異端者の体は穴だらけだった。彼の手には、煙を上げる即席の単発銃が横たわっている。
languages.original_text: The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.

traits.locale_text: 異端者の体は穴だらけだった。彼の手には、煙を上げる即席の単発銃が横たわっている。

languages.text: 这个异端分子的尸体被打得千疮百孔，手里临时拼凑的单发手枪正冒着烟。
languages.original_text: The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.

traits.locale_text: 这个异端分子的尸体被打得千疮百孔，手里临时拼凑的单发手枪正冒着烟。

languages.text: Der Körper des Ketzers ist voller Löcher. In seiner Hand liegt rauchend eine improvisierte Einzelschusswaffe.
languages.original_text: The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.

traits.locale_text: Der Körper des Ketzers ist voller Löcher. In seiner Hand liegt rauchend eine improvisierte Einzelschusswaffe.

languages.text: Le corps de l'hérétique est criblé de trous. De la fumée s'échappe encore du canon du pistolet improvisé qui gît dans sa main.
languages.original_text: The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.

traits.locale_text: Le corps de l'hérétique est criblé de trous. De la fumée s'échappe encore du canon du pistolet improvisé qui gît dans sa main.

languages.text: Kâfirin cesedi delik deşik olmuş. Elindeki tek atışlı derme çatma silahtan duman çıkıyor.
languages.original_text: The heretic's body is riddled with holes. An improvised single-shot gun lies smoking in his hand.
